Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Pinewood Hotel Rome in Rome, you'll be in a national park and convenient to Istituto Dermopatico dell'Immacolata and St. Peter's Basilica. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of San Carlo di Nancy Hospital and Vatican Gardens.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 80 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services. Additional amenities include babysitting/childcare, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a train station pick-up service.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Pinewood Hotel Rome in Rome, you'll be in a national park and convenient to Istituto Dermopatico dell'Immacolata and St. Peter's Basilica. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of San Carlo di Nancy Hospital and Vatican Gardens.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Istituto Dermopatico dell'Immacolata - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
San Carlo di Nancy Hospital - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Vatican Gardens - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Palace of the Governorate of Vatican City State - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Casina Pio IV - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Vatican Museums - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
Palace of Justice - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
Vatican Library - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Catholic University of the Sacred Heart - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Sistine Chapel - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Tribunale Ordinario di Roma - Sezione Penale - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Gemelli Polyclinic - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Paul VI Audience Hall - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
St. Peter's Basilica - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 18.3 km / 11.3 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 19.1 km / 11.8 mi

The preferred airport for Pinewood Hotel Rome is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
